# [Interview #1088: WoR Signing Report - Argent, Entry #37](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1088#37)

#### Question

Can you tell us which Shard is with [
*The Silence Divine*
]?

#### Brandon Sanderson

This is a world that does not currently have a Shard.
